</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the picture name or path of the item with the given position of the 2D listbox. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lnbPicture''' [idc, [row, column]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] - Number of [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of Row </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of Column </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lnbPicture''' [row, column] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> Control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> row: [[Number]] - Index of Row in given Control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> column: [[Number]] - Index of Column in given Control </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbPicture]] [200, [1, 1]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
